Projects

The Woolley Market

2014

Revitalizing and celebrating a town with history as rich as its soil.

Bike and Build

2012–2015

Campaigning for the affordable housing cause with bike rides across the USA.

Cinereach

2014

Archiving a decade of independent films, and facilitating a design process.

Energy Realities

2012

Visualizing global energy needs and abilities for National Geographic.

Gnarrboro

2015-2016

Building a community on a sustainable & maintainable platform (of trash).

Suffoca

2016

Spinning tales of travel through a UI of British humour and whimsy.
